00022 /**
00023  * @file   AnalysisInfo.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Wed Aug  2 14:05:13 2006
00026  *
00027  * @brief  Information about a particular analysis run.
00028  */
00029 
00030 #ifndef _ANALYSISINFO_H_
00031 #define _ANALYSISINFO_H_
00032 
00033 //
00034 #include "file/CDFFileData.h"
00035 #include "util/Err.h"
00036 #include "util/Util.h"
00037 //
00038 #include <cstring>
00039 #include <map>
00040 #include <string>
00041 
00042 /**
00043  * Information about a particular analysis run.
00044  */
00045 class AnalysisInfo {
00046 public:
00047 
00048   /** Constructor. */
00049   AnalysisInfo() {
00050     m_MaxPsNameLength = 0;
00051     m_NumExpression = 0;
00052     m_NumGenotyping = 0;
00053     m_NumReporting = 0;
00054     m_NumRows = 0;
00055     m_NumCols = 0;
00056     m_NumProbeSets = 0;
00057     m_ProbeSetType = affxcdf::UnknownProbeSetType;
00058     m_ChipType = "";
00059     m_ProgID = "";
00060     m_ProgramName = "";
00061     m_ProgramVersion = "";
00062     m_ProgramCompany = "";
00063     m_AlgName = "";
00064     m_AlgVersion = "";
00065     m_AnalysisGuid = "";
00066     m_ExecGuid = "";
00067   }
00068 
00069   /**
00070    * Add a key/value parameter pair to our inforomation. Keys must be unique strings.
00071    *
00072    * @param key - name of key to be stored.
00073    * @param value - matching value to be associated with key.
00074    */
00075   void addParam(const std::string &key, const std::string &value) {
00076     std::map<std::string, uint32_t>::iterator mapIx = m_KeysIndex.find(key);
00077     if(mapIx != m_KeysIndex.end()) {
00078       Err::errAbort("AnalysisInfo::addParam() - Key '" + key + "' has already been used.");
00079     }
00080     m_KeysIndex[key] = (uint32_t) m_ParamNames.size();
00081     m_ParamNames.push_back(key);
00082     m_ParamValues.push_back(value);
00083   }
00084 
00085   /**
00086    * Add client supplied key/value parameter pair to our information. Keys must be unique strings.
00087    *
00088    * @param key - name of key to be stored.
00089    * @param value - matching value to be associated with key.
00090    */
00091   void addClientMetaInfo(const std::string &key, const std::string &value) {
00092     std::map<std::string, uint32_t>::iterator mapIx = m_ClientInfoKeysIndex.find(key);
00093     if(mapIx != m_ClientInfoKeysIndex.end()) {
00094       Err::errAbort("AnalysisInfo::addClientMetaInfo() - Key '" + key + "' has already been used.");
00095     }
00096     m_ClientInfoKeysIndex[key] = (uint32_t) m_ClientInfoNames.size();
00097     m_ClientInfoNames.push_back(key);
00098     m_ClientInfoValues.push_back(value);
00099   }
00100 
00101 
00102   /**
00103     * Turn a Info set of parameters into a text representation of:
00104     *    key1=value1
00105     *    key2=value2
00106     *    key3=value3
00107     *
00108     * @param sep - optional separatar string, default newline
00109     *
00110     * @return - string representation of Info set.
00111     */
00112   std::string toString(std::string sep = "\n") {
00113       std::string str;
00114      str += "apt-info-chiptype=" + m_ChipType + sep;
00115      str += "apt-info-program-id=" + m_ProgID + sep;
00116      str += "apt-info-program-name=" + m_ProgramName + sep;
00117      str += "apt-info-program-version=" + m_ProgramVersion + sep;
00118      str += "apt-info-alg-name=" + m_AlgName + sep;
00119      str += "apt-info-alg-version=" + m_AlgVersion + sep;
00120      str += "apt-info-num-rows=" + ToStr(m_NumRows) + sep;
00121      str += "apt-info-num-cols=" + ToStr(m_NumCols) + sep;
00122      str += "apt-info-num-probesets=" + ToStr(m_NumProbeSets) + sep;
00123      for(uint32_t i = 0; i < m_ParamNames.size(); i++) {
00124         str += ("apt-info-" + m_ParamNames[i] + "=" + m_ParamValues[i] + sep);
00125      }
00126      return str;
00127   }
00128 
00129   int getNumCols() {
00130     return m_NumCols;
00131   }
00132 
00133   /// Length of the longest probeset name
00134   int m_MaxPsNameLength;
00135   /// Name of the analysis
00136   std::string m_AnalysisName;
00137   /// Number of expression probesets
00138   int m_NumExpression;
00139   /// Number of genotyping expression
00140   int m_NumGenotyping;
00141   /// How many snps to report in CHP file.
00142   int m_NumReporting;
00143   /// How many rows are on the grid of the chip.
00144   int m_NumRows;
00145   /// How many columns are the grid of the chip.
00146   int m_NumCols;
00147   /// How many probesets are on the chip and in cdf file. This is
00148   /// critical as probesets must be the exact same in number and order
00149   /// as in the cdf file.
00150   int m_NumProbeSets;
00151   /// What type of chp file is this? For our purposes here it is genotyping
00152   affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType m_ProbeSetType;
00153   /// What chip is this?
00154   std::string m_ChipType;
00155   /// What is our id for GCOS?
00156   std::string m_ProgID;
00157   /// What is the name of the program
00158   std::string m_ProgramName;
00159   /// What program created this chp file.
00160   std::string m_ProgramVersion;
00161   /// What company created this chp file
00162   std::string m_ProgramCompany;
00163   /// What algorithm are we reporting
00164   std::string m_AlgName;
00165   /// What version of the algorithm is being used.
00166   std::string m_AlgVersion;
00167   /// GUID (global unique ID) associated with a specific analysis
00168   std::string m_AnalysisGuid;
00169   /// GUID associated with a specific process
00170   std::string m_ExecGuid;
00171   /// These next two vectors are matched pairs, one contains the
00172   /// keys and the other the values. Would use a map, but want to be
00173   /// guaranteed of the order.
00174   std::vector<std::string> m_ParamNames;
00175   std::vector<std::string> m_ParamValues;
00176 
00177   /// A mapping of key names to their index in m_ParamNames.
00178   std::map<std::string, uint32_t> m_KeysIndex;
00179 
00180   /// Two vectors for client supplied meta-data. Matched pairs of vectors, one contains the
00181   /// keys and the other the values. Would use a map, but want to be
00182   /// guaranteed of the order.
00183   std::vector<std::string> m_ClientInfoNames;
00184   std::vector<std::string> m_ClientInfoValues;
00185 
00186   /// A mapping of key names to their index in m_ParamNames.
00187   std::map<std::string, uint32_t> m_ClientInfoKeysIndex;
00188   
00189   /// Vector of probeset names and groups as they should appear in the chp file.
00190   /// this memory is owned elsewhere as it is relatively large in size.
00191   /// Only populated if there is CHP output
00192   std::vector<const char *> m_ProbesetNames;
00193 
00194   /// Vector of probeset names and groups as they should appear in the chp file.
00195   /// this memory is owned elsewhere as it is relatively large in size.
00196   /// Only populated if there is CHP output
00197   std::vector<const char *> m_ProbesetDisplayNames;
00198 
00199 };
00200 
00201 #endif /* _ANALYSISINFO_H_ */
